import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { IoIosArrowBack, IoIosArrowForward, IoIosArrowDown } from "react-icons/io"; import { ReturnTakemedWhen } from './components/ReturnTakeMedWhen'; import { ReturnEvery } from './components/ReturnEvery'; export const GenerateQRCode = () => { const [ takeMedWhen, setTakeMedWhen ] = useState("ก่อนอาหาร"); const [ every, setEvery ] = useState("4"); const [ addtionalAdvice, setAdditionalAdvice ] = useState('ยานี้อาจระคายเคืองกระเพาะอาหาร ให้รับประทานหลังอาหารทันที') const handleTakeMedWhen = (value: string) => { setTakeMedWhen(value); } const handleEvery = (value: string) => { setEvery(value); } const handleAddtionalAdvice = (value: string) => { setAdditionalAdvice(value) } return (
Generate QR
Drug list
Paracetamol
หรือ
); }
